title.#cdata-section: Rig grounded on Lewis beach towed away by two tugs

description.#cdata-section: Transocean Winner, the rig that grounded on a west Lewis beach two weeks ago, has begun to be towed round the island by two tugs.

title.#cdata-section: First minister warns on cost of Brexit to Scotland

description.#cdata-section: The first minister will warn later that leaving the EU could cost the Scottish economy billions of pounds.

title.#cdata-section: Scotland's papers: 'Secret' police cuts and 'bagpipe lung'

description.#cdata-section: Claims that a deepening cash crisis will see hundreds of police axed and a bagpiper dies after deadly microbes are found in his pipes.

title.#cdata-section: Transformers: The Last Knight 'filming on Skye'

description.#cdata-section: Scenes for the new Transformers movie are understood to be being shot on the Isle of Skye.

title.#cdata-section: Scottish Gossip: Fletcher, Brown, Scotland, Celtic, Champions League

description.#cdata-section: West Bromwich midfielder Darren Fletcher is almost certain to replace Scott Brown as Scotland captain...
